name: Taaanks (dan.collins.dev)
description:
Taaanks is a simple tank game where the player destroys enemy tanks, turrets, and outposts.

Small Note - The web version isn't as performant as it should be at the moment. Downloading will yield a better experience.

Controls

  • W - Move Forward
  • S - Move Backward
  • A - Rotate Left
  • D - Rotate Right
  • Left Mouse Click - Fire
  • Right Mouse Click - Scan for landmines
  • M - Open mission tab in-game
  • Escape - Pauses the game
